column4: what's the name of the partition manager in the ubuntu installer?
does anyone know the name of the partition manager in the ubuntu installer?
so you allready have a windows install on the drive ?
got no idea, I would try a reboot and start again (if you haven't allready).
don't know if it has any chance of helping.  it just that if the drive is working I don't know what else to try.
NO! have you got the drive mounted ?
maybe the partition manager can't get access to /dev/hda or whatever the drive is.
try quiting the installer, and unmount the drive and restart the installer.
if you have an icon for the drive on the Desktop you can unmount with that.  "right click" on the icon once, and select "unmount volume"
have you have accessed the HDD while running the LiveCD ?
I am not sure what is going on, try a reboot and see if the problem still happens.
still empty list in partition manager
which version are you trying to install ?
ubuntu 7.04 feisty fawn desktop i386 32-bit version
maybe the 7.10 installer will work better with you setup.
yep, beta out now, 7.10 released in 6 days.
